root.name: Soreyuke! Burunyanman Portable: Torimodose! Ai to Seigi to Kibou no Tsunyakan
root.description: Soreyuke! Burunyanman Portable: Torimodose! Ai to Seigi to Kibou no Tsunyakan originated as a mini-game in the eroge Musumaker, and is now being expanded and brought to the PSP. Alchemist are publishing.
